meanings.definition: In a puzzled or questioning manner
meanings.sent1: She looked quizzically at the strange object, trying to understand its purpose.
meanings.sent2: He raised an eyebrow quizzically when he heard the unexpected news.
meanings.sent3: The cat tilted its head quizzically at the sound of a bird chirping indoors.
meanings.sent4: The old man peered quizzically at the modern technology, as if it were from another planet.
meanings.sent5: The child stared quizzically at the jigsaw puzzle, unsure of where to begin.

meanings.sent1: The quizzically expression on her face revealed her interest in the magic trick.
meanings.sent2: He gave her a quizzically smile, wondering what she found so amusing.
meanings.sent3: The puppy cocked its head quizzically at the squeaky toy, eager to play.
meanings.sent4: Her quizzically eyes sparkled with delight as she watched the comedy show.
meanings.sent5: The quizzically look on his face made everyone laugh at the silly joke.
